com.gopivotal.mapreduce.lib.input

Class DummyInputFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.InputFormat<org.apache.hadoop.io.NullWritable,org.apache.hadoop.io.NullWritable>
      • com.gopivotal.mapreduce.lib.input.DummyInputFormat

  • public class DummyInputFormat
extends org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.InputFormat<org.apache.hadoop.io.NullWritable,org.apache.hadoop.io.NullWritable>
    This input format starts a configurable number of map tasks. Both the key and value are NullWritable objects. It outputs a single key/value pair before closing.
